sn46.25:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you seven principles that guard against decline.
sn46.25:1.3: And what are the seven principles that guard against decline?
sn46.25:1.5: They are the seven awakening factors.
sn46.25:1.7: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.25:1.8: These are the seven principles that guard against decline.”
